description: Angelo applied on an accounting position for our company. He knew that we were producing adult content and was kind of expecting what would follow the routine questions when we told him he had to put the mask on for the interview. It was impossible for us not to ask this stunning jock to strip and show us how much he really want this job. And, no doubt about it, he really wanted it!
title: Naughty Job Interview 2, Scene #01
